text:
Need Rowan Bailey for Cotton On campaign. Budget around $3,147, looking for 1 x Instagram story, 2 x Pinterest pin, 1 x Instagram story, 1 x TV appearance. 11 week exclusivity from other fashion brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 3 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $3,147 budget

Need to confirm: deliverables
